name: Epic Princess
description:
Epic Princess

Undead Dudes have killed the King. Now it is up to the Princess to save the Kingdom and Save Us ALL !

Battle Your way across several exciting levels.

In this RPG genre Game, the gameplay features and content You can expect are listed below . . .

The Game features a Save-Point at the start of each new map.

You can customize Your Appearance.

You can Choose Your Weapon and Shield and use the Inventory System.

There are also Health Potions and Bombs.

The Game uses the Power of Unreal Engine 5 for Vast and Detailed Game Maps.

Here are some of the features and content You can expect . . .

The Levels get more challenging as You progress.

Advance Enemy A.I. that will detect and Follow You and get into battles with You.

Stunning Graphics in each Map of the Game to draw You into the World.

Enhance Your Battle Skills as You travel across the Environments.

Use Your Combat Skills against Many Challenging Foes.

An action-packed fight to the death set in a fairy tale world.

A beautiful, strong-willed princess who refuses to wed the Undead Leader, So, they killed her father, the King.

With her scorned, vindictive suitor intent on taking her father’s throne, She must protect the kingdom.

Fight Your way thru to the Evil Dragon in the Last Level to Win the Game !

More details about the gameplay . . .

Battle Your way thru Waves of Undead Enemies across many Levels.

You can change Weapons.

You can change Shields.

You can Change Your Outfit and Customize Your Appearance.

Explore the vast Maps to find and defeat many Challenging Foes.

Use the Inventory System to aid You thru Your Quest.

Progress to the Evil Dragon Boss to Win the Game.
